reviews.review: I loved it! So many heroes fighting along side of each other, trying to save the world. The action scenes were phenomenal and the humor was typical Marvel! LOVE!

10/10 
I can't believe that even after ten years, they still find a way to keep raising the bar. Just phenomenal
I must say...coming from a DC fan. This is a amazing film. Gut wrenching. May 3 2019 is so far away.

Epic build up for the next movie. Scary in how bold the writers were. And I was very sad at the end but I'm impressed with the buildup! The movie is not a great standalone movie but it could be a critical asset to the end game. Nobody was happy at the end, but I was happy to see it again... :)
This movie did not have enough wow moments in the action and the ending was absolutely terrible. Worst Marvel movie that I’ve seen.

It's nothing special. Just another predictable Marvel movie that relies on jokes to draw the audience in.

SFX: Well rendered. It was nothing special, but it was good enough to where it didn't become a distraction for me in any part of the movie.


Music: Very generic and forgettable. It killed a lot of what could have been tense moments.

Action: Nothing special or memorable. You don't really feel the sense that you're dealing with super powered, or super enhanced, characters in this movie. It feels like a generic action movie. It also doesn't help that the characters are constantly cracking jokes throughout these tense moments, and it also doesn't help that the trailers revealed the best moments.

Story: Very predictable, like all of these MCU movies. There was no real build up to the end of the movie; from the beginning to the end, it was just non-stop action and joke cracking, and this got old quick. There were very few moments of any real tension, or a sense of urgency and seriousness from the characters. 
The plot was all over the place, and it was also just so poorly paced. 

Highlights: Josh Brolin was amazing as Thanos. 

Lowlights: The amount of jokes in this movie, and the lack of a proper build up, really killed the sense of dread and urgency that should have been in this story.

2.5/5

NO SPOLIERS!!!!!! If you don’t read comics, 5 star movie, good story, lots of action, all the characters blend seamlessly. If you do read the comics...1 star. Thanos and the Black Order are extremely watered down...infuriatingly so.
Too jumpy from scene to scene. And ridiculous ending - like a tv show that wants to suck you into watching the next episode but instead is an irritating turn-off
Epic, colossal, intense, captivating and with a shocking end.

The ultimate culmination of a 10 year build up! Infinity War is a game changer that breaks away from the typical happy lucky formula of the previous films so be ready for a lot of gut wrenching moments. It is truly amazing what the Russo brothers have pulled off here!
